name: GTK+ Loaders File
summary: Learn about .LOADERS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: An example application that uses GTK+ LOADERS files is Pidgin, an instant messenging client.

description: Program support file used by applications that use GTK+ (the GIMP Toolkit), a framework used for creating multi-platform GUIs; contains data used in the process of loading and updating GTK+ components.
